comment:
Matt,

I've worked with many budgeting apps and Buckets is the most to my liking so far, that is a huge compliment. ;-) I really like the down-to-earth, no-nonsense approach you've been taking with Buckets.

Of course, I still would've done some things differently but because I have worked with so many apps already, I know that in the end it really doesn't matter that much.

Keep it up and lots of love from Germany,
Bassim
name: Bassim
